description: Here’s the bottom line:  You’re a beer enthusiast and always on a quest for new brew experiences.  Cheers! is an app that will help you locate bars, breweries, beer stores and homebrew supply retailers in the city of your choosing.  Once you’ve located an interesting spot, you can check out their ratings on beer selection, service, atmosphere and food.  You can view images, see their location in GoogleMaps and save the spot in your favorites.  You can also view their contact information (phone & address), initiate a call from the app and share your find with your friends via email or text message.  You never know, you may end up where everybody knows your name!
